alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 2:19PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, southeastern Lexington and south central Richland Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 219 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gaston, or 11 miles south of Cayce, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cayce, Pine Ridge, Gaston, SC State Farmer`s Market, Sandy Run, Swansea, New Zion, Silver Lake, Lexington Acres Pond and Dixiana. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 116 and 128. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
